name: PotSurvive
description:
The story of a revengeful Pot

Pot and Fish were best friends. The Fish lived in the water inside the Pot. One day a group of spiders entered inside the Pot while he was sleeping. They drank all the water, suffocating poor fish to death. The sorrowful Pot went on a rampage against the creepy spiders to avenge his best friend.

Kill the spiders and survive

Controls

  • Player Move - AWSD
  • Shoot - Left Mouse Button
  • Aim - Mouse
